attributes.action: Stop the proposed closure of Coastguard Rescue Co-ordination Centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please support our Coastguard Rescue Co-ordination centres from proposed closures. Proposed closures will save relatively little money and make qualfied officers unemployed. Closures lead to lack of local knowledge which creates a major safety concern and unnecessary loss of life.
